system.description: Effect: Items and sharp edges over the [Blast] area begin crackling with electricity. A creature that attacks through the live conductors takes a Tick of Electric Type HP damage for every meter they travel. If a creature attacks at least 3 meters through the hazard, they gain Paralysis 5. The presence of Rainy Weather and Electric Terrain reduces the number of meters required to cause Paralysis by 1 each.
